SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.services

Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.services.CourseService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CourseService extends Object implements Serializable
Service class for managing course-related operations.

Provides functionality for course retrieval, creation, update, and filtering. Handles business logic and validation rules for courses, including duplicate checks and admin validation. Uses repositories for persistence and a mapper for DTO/entity conversion.

  • Method Details

    • getCoursesWithFilters

      public Map<String,Object> getCoursesWithFilters(Long id, String title, Integer duration, String description, CourseArea area, Language language, String adminName, Boolean courseIsActive, CourseParameter parameter, OrderBy orderBy, Integer offset, Integer limit, Long excludeCompletedByUserId, List<Long> excludeCourseIds)
      Retrieves courses with advanced filtering options.
      Parameters:
      id - Optional filter by course ID
      title - Optional filter by course title
      duration - Optional filter by course duration
      description - Optional filter by course description
      area - Optional filter by course area
      language - Optional filter by course language
      adminName - Optional filter by admin name
      courseIsActive - Optional filter by active status
      parameter - Optional filter by course parameter
      orderBy - Optional ordering
      offset - Starting position for pagination
      limit - Maximum number of results
      excludeCompletedByUserId - Exclude courses completed by this user
      excludeCourseIds - Exclude these course IDs
      Returns:
      Map containing filtered course DTOs and pagination info

    • createNewCourse

      public CourseDTO createNewCourse(CourseNewDTO dto, Long adminId)
      Creates a new course if the title and link do not already exist and the admin user is valid.
      Parameters:
      dto - the CourseNewDTO containing course data (must include adminId)
      adminId - the ID of the admin user creating the course
      Returns:
      CourseDTO if the course was created, null if a course with the same title or link exists or admin not found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with message "duplicateTitle" or "duplicateLink" if duplicate found

    • updateCourse

      public boolean updateCourse(CourseUpdateDTO dto)
      Updates an existing course with new data.
      Parameters:
      dto - the CourseUpdateDTO containing updated course data (must include course id)
      Returns:
      true if the course was updated, false if not found or invalid input
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with message "duplicateTitle" or "duplicateLink" if duplicate found

    • countAllCourses

      public long countAllCourses()
      Counts all courses in the system.
      Returns:
      The total number of courses.

    • countCoursesByActive

      public long countCoursesByActive(boolean active)
      Counts all courses filtered by active status.
      Parameters:
      active - true to count only active courses, false for inactive
      Returns:
      The number of courses matching the active status.
